title: Simple bounds for the auxiliary function of Riemann
abstract:
We give simple numerical bounds for $\zeta(s)$, $\vartheta(s)$,
$\mathop{\mathcal R}(s)$, $Z(t)$, for use in the numerical computation of these
functions.
  The purpose of the paper is to give bounds for several functions needed in
the calculation of $\zeta(s)$ and $Z(t)$. We are not pretending to have any
originality. Our object is to be useful as a reference in our work for simple
(simple to compute and simple to check) bounds.
